creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: towel scarf of gauze-like cotton material embroidered at each end with a row of four floral trees springing from small pots in scarlet, rose, flesh and brown silks and tinsel; a border of open work tinsel embroidered with stiffly drawn flowers runs across each end and part way up the sides; silk and tinsel on cotton
title: Towel scarf
